name: Missed Connections (Holly)
description:
You’re catching a train out to the big city, but you aren’t leaving for good… right?

It’ll be a long ride for Peyton as they contemplate what it means to leave home on this strange and meandering train ride.

Chat with the other passengers and discover what baggage each of them has brought with them and what they have to offer Peyton about their own contemplations on life.

A short point-and-click narrative game about leaving home and making a life for yourself.

Controls: Mouse only

Credits:

Art & Code:

Holly Thomas

Writing & Code:

Seb Pines

Created with support from the Hand Eye Society and Canada Council for the Arts.  Created as part of the Hand Eye Society Super Festival Jam.
